= Project Cost Forecast Summary =
Part of the Monthly reporting package.

Prepare AFTER receiving the updated LE file from the client:
* In the LE file, group or hide columns O through BN, BO through DI, and DT through DV.
* In a second instance of Excel, open the Summary Cost Report and enter the values as follows:
		* Shell Funding Expense Total = DL
		* Shell SAP to Date = DR
		* Shell Forecast = DZ
